item.title: Miami-Dade sheriff's deputy fatally shot after responding to crash, officials say
item.description: Deputy Devin Jaramillo responded to a traffic crash when he was "brutally attacked and murdered," Miami-Dade Sheriff Rosie Cordero-Stutz said.
